eventSummary:
A state-sponsored threat actor is executing a complex phishing campaign targeting Signal users in Germany, specifically aiming at high-ranking politicians, military personnel, and journalists.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/campuscodi.risky.biz/post/3mecow3ehlc27

BreachForums is experiencing a potential security compromise, displaying a defacement-style message and a countdown timer alongside leaked personal images.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/1972819519807852544/status/2020239756332871796

Financial custodian Betterment suffered a data breach exposing information of 1.4 million customers. The incident involved a vishing attack against a third-party vendor, identified as Salesforce, to compromise IT support.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/alexisrjimenez.bsky.social/post/3mebs22l3w72e

Payments platform BridgePay confirmed that a ransomware attack was the cause of a recent service outage.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/128484298/status/2020168391521382628

A large-scale attack is targeting Mac users via GitHub Pages by impersonating various companies to deliver stealer malware.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/4827396790/status/2020114616697704471
